document.full_text: the n.b.a. has fined kobe bryant of the los angeles lakers $100,000 for directing an antigay slur at a referee during tuesday's victory over the san antonio spurs.
document.title: bryant fined $100,000 by n.b.a. for gay slur
lines_and_colors: the n.b.a. has fined kobe bryant of the los angeles lakers $100,000 for directing an antigay slur at a referee during tuesday's victory over the san antonio spurs.
